data.text: @darrengrimes_ 700 plus uk citizens died in last 7 days. Are you that stupid really??

@darrengrimes_ The uk dropped all restrictions and the numbers are going up again even though the requirement to test has gone.   But you are right as far as the news is concerned you have to look for it
@darrengrimes_ Just get off twitter Darren ffs..

@darrengrimes_ I'm sitting here reading this I have full blow  covid waiting on a clear test I'm 52 have COPD a heart murmur the only symptoms I had was sore legs a bit of a sore head for a few hours and hot, I have all my vexines apart from that one I must be lucky
@darrengrimes_ Ok...we will tell any other deadly viruses to stay away in future.

@darrengrimes_ Isn't it funny how when a war is going on the Government, with the support of fuck-witted lickspittles such as yourself, are able to pretend Covid no-longer exists, to satisfy the right-wing nut jobs who pay your bills.

@darrengrimes_ I don’t think we inflicted covid on ourselves and I guess you’re lucky enough not to know anyone who’s really suffered from it. Just being a young naive fool. You really let yourself down in your posts about a serious pandemic.
